title: Build Android APP and Admin Panel - POC
desc: We are looking for an Android App (both mobile and tab devices) along with a small web admin.The whole idea of the app is that the users will register, send questions and admin can reply back..Please see more details below:1. User/Visitor App:- Users Can register using facebook, Google+, Phone Number and these details should be captured in backend DB- Can login, logout on the app- Can ask questions- Can pay in-app.- If there are no free questions for the user, they can still post but system will tell them to pay before it really reaches to admin. I believe Google payment will be integrated. Post payment the question gets sends to the backend admin.- Can set their profile after login into app, like full name, DOB, Time of Birth,  City of Birth, email etc.. These details to be stored in backend DB.- Can rate the answer, 1-5 stars - which then also gets stored in DB- There should be a placeholder at the bottom of the app to show banner ad. Put testing ad code from admob.- User first login should be welcome with a message which should be configurable from backend- Can receive app notifications when admin sends a message from backend.2. Admin:- Can login / logout from the backend- Can configure the system with some pre-defined settings like in-app amount, system auto-generated messages, how many free questions will be given to users.- So for ex., if there is 1 question free setup in the backend. The users in the APP will get a free question and for next question they have to do in app purchase.- Can create, edit, delete, list questions- The question list should show up latest first and there should be action items against each question : action 2 buttons: 'Answer' and 'Answer and Give Credit'. 'Answer and Give Credit' will give another question free for user along with the answer. 'Answer' will only send answer to user. There should be another button against each user "Send Message" which will send app notification to the user.- There should be an option to send message to all users also.- Will receive notifications via email and on dashboard for all questions.- Can see list of all users along with whatever questions they have asked and their profile details- Theme is already purchased for backend..3. General Requirements:- Users can ask questions but if it's not free, they will ask but application will seek in app google purchase. There should be a field in the backend- App and backend should have  english, hinglish and Hindi- We will share licensed backend admin theme to be used.- Users should be able to use the APP when offline (not on net).- Also, for ex., if user is offline (not on net) and CRM is replying, the answer should reach user when they gets connected to internet next time.- Crashlytics is required- Slider menu from right or left. Prefer right.- Slider menu comes with some sub-menu items- APP should work on both mobile and tablets.- Support till latest android- mySQL and CodeIgniter preferred.- Code should be latest Android Studio ready.4. Workflow:USER REGISTER - LOGIN - GET BONUS QUESTION (as setup in backend) and SYSTEM SENDS AUTO WELCOME MESSAGE - USER ASKS QUESTION - QUESTION ASSIGNED TO Admin as New Status and Admin can answer back to user from the backend and there should be a notification to the user on the app and the email

title: Replicate  iOS APP for OpenVPN ( Not APP Store APP )
desc: Description: Duplicated or Built iOS app for iPhone/iPad using OpenVPN Protocol.Key Details:1) Will not be in the APP store. Clients require download file/link on my server.2) Will be using OpenVPN Protocol. Please duplicate this APP: [url removed, login to view]3) Compatible with iOS 10 and 114) The app has one functionally page, just power button and choose a server. About us page from the side menu.5) We will need to change the Username/Password for every client we provide the Profile and/or APP too. (Separate build for each user)6) Re-brand/design app. We will provide the animations and logo.Additional Notes: - We just finished our Android APP. - We have Logo, Animations. - The Open VPN app works very well because it connects fast, tried until connected, keeps the user connected if disconnect and saves battery. All are required and very important for us. - I am a System Administrator and Project Manager of this Project. - See attached for resources - We will translate the APP from English to another language. We have iPhone 6s and 5s for testing.

title: Andriod AND IOS
desc: I want to make a project that will host maintenance companies & customers.Customer wants to make maintenance for his home. So he login and submit an order ( what / where ) .customer can choose the companies manually or he leaves it to the app to chose the closest company for him.Companies receives the order and he needs 24 hours to finish it. if he didn't then the works will pass again to the customer so he can chose an other company or the system does.  And that particular company gets suspended for 48 hours.Next, Emergency calls, a customer can submit an emergency call. that the company should reply to it in maximum one hour. and order should finish in 6 hours. If company didn't reply it gets suspend for 48 hour.Lastly, if the customer wants to select the company manually for his order. the app should show him each company in his area and the distance between the customer and the company.===================================================================You will use AWS bitnami server so u don't need to bother with the database, will develop the UML first and I need to agree on it. Next, u will start the implementation.So, Bitnamin with ( Andriod + IOS ) - u need to consider the development versions to support 99% of the marketMajor information needed :Companies :-* Name*Address*email*mobile numberCustomer:-*name*Address*email*mobile numberAddress:-*Location( lat/ lon)*building number*street numberBased on the above information, develop me A UML attached with your proposal to show me your understanding, Should have : USE CASE + CLASS DIAGRAM

We would like to be able to sign patients up to our delivery and intake their forms over the internet. We would like to be able to display our product menu publicly, but only logins can order. We would like inventory management. We would like to be as mobile friendly as possible, and hopefully develop an actual app for orders and delivery. The "Easy Button" ordering  is what we are going for.

title: Flash application convert to HTML5 & other
desc: Looking to convert current Flash based applications into HTML5 format.  More specifically, we are looking to convert below quiz/games on this site:[url removed, login to view]1) "Tic-Tac-Toe" (Beginer & Advanced)2) Pinyin Lightning quiz (Including beginer & Advanced)3) Pinyin Tones (Including Tone Master + Blue Quiz)4) Number dictation;Requirements:1. Stylistically consistent among all applications, I am looking for an improved design from the current version  - taking advantage of HTML5's versatility;  The final design should be up to my satisfaction.2. The final deliverable should  functionally capable of achieve same functions as they are currently.  In addition, all exercises should store & display a record of "best scores";  The storage of "best scores" will be a local structured file,  no database;3. Sound file and current file will be provided.4. The webpages should pass Google Mobile Friendly test.  The coder is responsible to fix any and all issues presented from the test before the project can be considered complete:[url removed, login to view]The underline applications are tools assisting people learning Pinyin, it's essential that you understand the basic concept of Pinyin and tones.  It's also critical that you understand the logic of the current application from the coding point of view before you even bid on this project.

title: Hire an Android Developer
desc: Looking for Mobile App for Android & iOS .... to be built integrating with AWS Mobile SDK and AWS components including the DynamoDB as DB and other AWS as applicable.The mobile app is for Member Display and Management need for an non profit organization.* Login Page* Members Registration* Membership Form (Contact Us form)* Members approved and given responsibility / (designation) based on their interest* Existing members authenticate to the app to access full functionality* Members can be displayed in the list either in specialized group or on the respective category* Private member directory/search (Find a member)* Google Ads Panels / Banner* Sponsor List* Job board* Newsletter editor* Community posts* Event calendar View* Event registration* Event managementShould also have Admin section:* Login Page* Admin Dash Board* Member database (with different states: applied, pending, approved)* Private member directory/search (Find a member)* Membership interest form (Contact Us form)* Online member portal area* Member data Export* Member management* Website Integration* Google Ads Mgmt* Job board* Newsletter editor* Community posts* Event calendar* Event registration* Event management* Volunteer managementThe chosen freelancer has to submit a clear proposal / document of the understanding the requirement along with the detailed typical layout and functionality to understand just so that the requirement and proposal are in the same page. Only after this is done the project can be closed / initiated.
